name: St. Francis Center (Redwood City)
description: Accepts donations of clothing, shoes, bedding, housewares, furniture, and appliances; serves low-income families in Redwood City area; pickup available
fullDescription: St. Francis Center in Redwood City accepts donations of clothing and household items to support their programs serving low-income families in the Redwood City area.
whatTheyOffer:
- Accept clothing and shoes
- Accept bedding and housewares
- Accept furniture and appliances
- Pickup available for large items
- Serves Redwood City families
- Items distributed to those in need
howToGetIt:
1. Visit St. Francis Center
2. Bring gently used items
3. Schedule pickup for large items
4. Donations help local families
5. Check hours before visiting
6. Get donation receipt
keywords: St. Francis Center, Redwood City, donate clothes, donate furniture, donate appliances, clothing donation, household donation, pickup, low-income families
